channel.title: Ubuntu Overview & Installation :: CIS 527 Textbook
channel.description: Resources Slides VMware/Tools from Ubuntu Ubuntu Features from Ubuntu Ubuntu Desktop Guide from Ubuntu Ubuntu Server Guide from Ubuntu Switching to Ubuntu from Ubuntu Linux Distribution Timeline from Wikipedia Desmond Tutu on Ubuntu from YouTube K-State CS Mirror of Ubuntu Downloads (only accessible on campus and via the K-State VPN) Video Script For the second part of this module, weâ€™ll be looking at one other operating system, Ubuntu. Ubuntu is built using the Linux kernel, which is a completely free and open source operating system kernel developed by Linus Torvalds in 1991.
